column5: Well after largly ignoring rainbow fishing this fall due to other "priorities"  decided i'd give it a good go today. Had pretty high hopes after hearing how well some people did last weekend... Started out bright and early loaded a friends canoe up with the trolling motor and off we went. Tried this and tried that, tried everything in the box lol... Finally after the sun peaked out shortly after noon i got  one 4 and a half pounder. Going to give it a try again tomorrow without the canoe. I'm too big and after 5 hours in this canoe i remembered why i haven't been in one for five years.
You do look a little cramped  Well done,  Good luck tomorrow
Great job 12footspringbok Real purdy one!!! Leechman
Trade ya some smoked rainbow for some jerky...
